com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer.events
Class AdShowEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer.events.AdEvent
      com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer.events.AdShowEvent

public class AdShowEvent
extends AdEvent

Event containing data on an ad that is being shown

Constructor Summary
AdShowEvent(boolean isActivityInterstitial, String loadedNetowrk, ArrayList<String> failedCreativeNetworks, boolean isRefresh)
          Constructs a new AdShowEvent
 
Method Summary
 ArrayList<String> getFailedCreativesNetworks()
          Gets the list of networks which Burstly attempted to retrieve an ad from but did not provide a valid ad
 String getLoadedCreativeNetwork()
          Gets the network which provided the ad that was cached
 boolean isActivityInterstitial()
          Will the ad be shown in a new Activity
 boolean isRefreshedAd()
          Gets a flag saying if this AdShowEvent resulted from an ad being refreshed
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

AdShowEvent

public AdShowEvent(boolean isActivityInterstitial,
                   String loadedNetowrk,
                   ArrayList<String> failedCreativeNetworks,
                   boolean isRefresh)
Constructs a new AdShowEvent

Parameters:
isActivityInterstitial - Flag telling whether this ad will be shown in a new Activity. If false it will only be visible if the view associated with this ad is attached to the layout.
loadedNetowrk - The network providing the creative that was cached
failedCreativeNetworks - The list of networks which Burstly attempted to retrieve but did not provide a valid ad
isRefresh - Is this ad showing as the result of a refresh. true if it's a refreshed banner, false if it's the first time it is shown
Method Detail

isActivityInterstitial

public boolean isActivityInterstitial()
Will the ad be shown in a new Activity

Returns:
if false shown in current Activity and will only be visible if the view associated with this ad is attached to the layout. if true the ad will be shown in a new Activity

getLoadedCreativeNetwork

public String getLoadedCreativeNetwork()
Gets the network which provided the ad that was cached

Returns:
The name of the network which provided the cached ad

getFailedCreativesNetworks

public ArrayList<String> getFailedCreativesNetworks()
Gets the list of networks which Burstly attempted to retrieve an ad from but did not provide a valid ad

Returns:
The list of networks which Burstly attempted to retrieve an ad from but did not provide a valid ad

isRefreshedAd

public boolean isRefreshedAd()
Gets a flag saying if this AdShowEvent resulted from an ad being refreshed

Returns:
true if this was the result of an ad refresh, false otherwise
